title: AHS Apocalypse 8 Ambiguous Questions in Episode 1 That Require Answers
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: The “I can’t believe we actually did it” he’s talking about all of humanity as In we (humanity) finally destroyed the earth.

I think the news reporter saying I can't believe we actually did it was just saying that he can't believe that Humanity actually came to this point. I am assuming he's from the US so he could also be saying the US instigated this. If he was talking about another country other than the US then he would have to use they because if not he would be including the US as part of the instigation.  I think, it was a general statement on the state of humanity.
I'm getting some strong Adam and Eve vibes with Timothy and Emily. Why else would their "perfect genetic makeup" matter?
I would`nt be suprised if the cooperative turns up yo be Ally`s cult from the last season. Notice how all people in power in the outpost are women. I can totally se SCUM robes in purple :D
I’m guessing the “greys” were just survivors seeking shelter , and the rich survivors were put as purples .
